text: Allakh priyemlet dushi lyudey v mig smerti i priyemlet dushi lyudey, kogda oni spyat. On uderzhivayet u Sebya te dushi, kotorym prednaznacheno umeret', i ne vozvrashchayet ikh v tela, a otpravlyayet dushi v tela tekh lyudey, kotorym ne prednaznacheno poka umeret', i oni vstayut posle sna do opredelonnogo im sroka. V etom - yavnyye znameniya dlya lyudey, obladayushchikh razumom
